messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happy Persian New Year!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thank you.....and Happy Spring to everybody!! You can see Obama s message to the Iranian people and leaders here, along with the Colbert Report which is
messages.messageBody:
On 3/22/2009 8:01 AM, Sandra Dodd wrote:
> -=-I almost forgot to wish Pam and her family a Happy New Year!-=-
>
> Marty works at a Persian restaurant, which is where I got my
> reminder.:-)
>
>


Thank you.....and Happy Spring to everybody!!

You can see Obama's message to the Iranian people and leaders here,
along with the Colbert Report which is also about it (sort of <G>).
<http://www.elephantjournal.com/2009/03/obama-stirring-message-to-iranian-people-video-and-colbert-funny-one/>


Spring has sprung for the Western Hemispherians among us, and that means
this is a time of renewal, growth, fertility and, for most of us it
means an uplifting of our spirits! That's what Naw Ruz is all about!

-pam

messages.subject: Happy Persian New Year!
messages.msgSnippet: I almost forgot to wish Pam and her family a Happy New Year! I only found out that it was today after watching Rick Steves trip to Iran, and hearing a young
messages.messageBody:
I almost forgot to wish Pam and her family a Happy New Year!

I only found out that it was today after watching Rick Steves' trip to
Iran, and hearing a young Iranian musician (she lives in Los Angeles)
on the radio. Both programs mentioned the New Year's celebrations in
Iran and the expat community.

Robin B.
